docs.snippet: Arriving in the United States in groups from various parts of the far-flung battlefront in the Western and Southern Pacific, nearly 250 survivors of the war with Japan brought home yesterday their experiences of fighting the enemy in the sky, on land...
docs.lead_paragraph: Arriving in the United States in groups from various parts of the far-flung battlefront in the Western and Southern Pacific, nearly 250 survivors of the war with Japan brought home yesterday their experiences of fighting the enemy in the sky, on land and on sea on Bataan and Corregidor, in the Coral Sea, off Australia and elsewhere.
docs.abstract: Arrives, US; int; promotion to lt comdr recommended

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 7 -- To stop the export by the Axis to Latin America of American dollars seized in Europe, the Uruguayan Government had conferred upon its Central Bank the exclusive right to purchase, import or export American bank notes, the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 7 -- To stop the export by the Axis to Latin America of American dollars seized in Europe, the Uruguayan Government had conferred upon its Central Bank the exclusive right to purchase, import or export American bank notes, the Commerce Department reported yesterday.
docs.abstract: Uruguay gives Central Bank execlusive US dollar trading powers; curbs travel funds; US Commerce Dept cites need for further Latin-Amer controls

docs.snippet: WITH a 13,000-mile motor tour into all but one of the South American republics, Herbert C. Lanks completed a decade's study of the Pan American Highway system. In telling about it in this book he reports, to quote the publisher's statement, "the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WITH a 13,000-mile motor tour into all but one of the South American republics, Herbert C. Lanks completed a decade's study of the Pan American Highway system. In telling about it in this book he reports, to quote the publisher's statement, "the first journey by automobile in one sustained tour from the Caribbean to the Straits of Magellan."
docs.abstract: Lanks, Herbert C; Pan American Highway through South America

headline.main: Along the Highways of South America; THE PAN AMERICAN HIGHWAY THROUGH SOUTH AMERICA. By Herbert C. Lanks. With photographs by the author and endpaper map. 217 pp. New York: D. Appleton-Century Company. $5.
